name: Nuun MEC Multi Pack Series Electrolyte Drink Tablets
categories: MEC Multi Pack Series Sport Electrolyte Repla
description: A deluxe boxed set of Nuun Tablets with 4 of the most popular flavours: Lemon Lime, Fruit Punch, Strawberry Lemonade and Watermelon. These electrolyte-replacing tablets are great for endurance events, long bike rides and hikes, or any event that requires a quick boost.Contains 4 tubes, each with 10 tablets.Revised formula contains no preservatives or artificial sweeteners, and now contains non-GMO dextrose and stevia as sweeteners.Dissolve one tablet in 500ml to 650ml water.
